scripts.lint: dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- prettier --cache-location=.prettiercache --check . && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- eslint . --report-unused-disable-directives --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --max-warnings 0 && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- tsc
scripts.lint:fix: dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- prettier --cache-location=.prettiercache --write . && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- eslint . --report-unused-disable-directives --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --max-warnings 0 --fix && dotenv -e ../../.env.local -- tsc
